import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../../../styles/user/upload-video/style.scss' import Icon from 'react-icons-kit' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form" import { ic_cloud_upload } from 'react-icons-kit/md' import axios from 'axios' import url from '../../../utils/url' import { toast } from 'react-toastify' import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css' import Navbar from '../../../components/UserNavbar/Index' const Audio = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm() const [isLoading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0) const onSubmit = async (data) => { console.log(data) setLoading(true) setProgress(20) } return (
Upload Audio
{/* Title */}
{errors.title && errors.title.message ? ( {errors.title && errors.title.message} ) : Audio title }
{/* Category */}
{errors.category && errors.category.message ? ( {errors.category && errors.category.message} ) : Select category }
{/* Audio */}

setLoading(false)}>{progress}%

: null}
); }; export default Audio;
